name: how it feel like to be on twitter fr
name_original: how it feel like to be on twitter fr
description:
i hate how ppl say use the arrow keys and 'wasd' to move.. i know someone who has a friend who makes $300k at the grammys and you can actually only move down (down arrow key or press 's')

a friend of a friend has 2 phds and this game actually has more than 1 difficulty, you just have to find the secret menu that they dont want you to click
